title: Not sure when we should recieve sneaky sivir
body:
im pretty sure i did the watch thingy of the OPL games and clicked the links pretty early
it said we should recieve them this next week(this week) but not sure when
is there a set date or is it over time?

replies.body: Over time, but within that week (assuming all goes to plan). If it helps, I haven't got mine yet either, so seems like this one might just be taking a bit longer.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=FJzd0YNM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-09T14:13:44.314+0000)
>
> Over time, but within that week (assuming all goes to plan). If it helps, I haven't got mine yet either, so seems like this one might just be taking a bit longer.

whats this about?

> [{quoted}](name=Gehirn,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=FJzd0YNM,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-15T03:26:27.768+0000)
>
> It was about this: https://oce.lolesports.com/giveaway

its over isn't it?
Yes, it ended when the OPL Final ended and the skins were granted in the following week.

I'll chase this up and see about getting it done asap.

EDIT: Skin distribution is complete!
